message: Let's start fair. I take the bigger share, but you get something too.  What do you say?
I'll take a smaller share now, but I want more later. Your turn!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the money closer to 60/40 this time.  I think this is a fair deal that gives us both a good amount.
I'm willing to split it 50/50, but I think I can do better than that in the next round.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a larger share.  Let's try 70/30 this time.  It's getting late, and we both want to get something.
I'm taking a bigger share now, but I'm still willing to give you something. Don't expect me to be so generous next time!
We're running out of time. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.  It's the best we can do at this point.
